summary: Xmusic - The Music Experts - Xmusic is a music store that offers a wide range of musical instruments and accessories. They have guitars, strings, amplifiers, drums & percussion, piano & keyboards, studio equipment, PA & live sound equipment, microphones, and cables. They also offer free shipping, instore WiFi, parking, advice, and coffee. Xmusic sells products from brands like Boss, D'Angelico, Fender, Gibson, Orange, Pearl, PreSonus, and Roland. They currently have a sale on LAVA guitars. Xmusic is located at Red Cow, Dublin 22, Ballymount, Ireland. They have a team of experts who can provide assistance with guitars, bass, amps & effects, keyboards, drums, studio equipment, and web orders.
